attributes.action: Issue Dragon Skin body Armour To Front Line Troops
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
British Forces deserve the best protection in the world!

We ask that at least the British Army trial Pinnacle Armor's, "Dragon Skin"

There is no other armour like it. It has great protection without armored steel, heavy plates. It is a flexible body armour so troops can move better.

There is no better protection!
